name: Personal Investment Management & Financial Advice Association
legal: UK company limited by a guarantee; not for profit organisation
goal:
Personal Investment Management & Financial Advice Association (PIMFA) is a trade association that represents 180 wealth management firms (full members) and associate members who provide professional services to our full member firms.
PIMFA members firms look after over Â£825 billion of wealth for over 2.2 million retail investors.
PIMFA full members deal in stocks, shares and other financial instruments including packaged retail investment products and personal pensions for individuals, trusts and charities through a range of services spanning execution only, advisory and discretionary fund management.
PIMFA exists to support its members and their clients through education and engagement, advocacy and influence, research and analysis and by playing an active role as a facilitator and thought leader.
PIMFA firms operate across more than 580 sites, employing over 27 000 staff. These firms also run over 5.5 million client portfolios and carry out over 20 million trades a year.
